Hi, you can use the following command to build the docker image of the standalone server.

```
./mvnw -B clean install \
          -Dmaven.test.skip \
          -Dmaven.javadoc.skip \
          -Dmaven.checkstyle.skip \
          -Pdocker,release -Ddocker.tag=ci \
          -pl dolphinscheduler-standalone-server -am
```
